pengu.messenger

Class PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem
  • Enclosing class:
    PenguMessengerClient

    public static class PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for active chat objects to be created so that active chat information can be stored in an array. It stores details about an active chat: the username, the display/friendly name, the contact group, the contact group color, the last message preview, the last message status, the chat ID, and the if the last message was read.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActiveChatItem

        public ActiveChatItem(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String displayName,
                      java.lang.String messagePreview,
                      java.lang.String messageStatus,
                      java.lang.String contactGroup,
                      java.awt.Color contactColor,
                      int chatID,
                      boolean lastMessageSeen)
        Parameterized constructor method, that receives the username, display name, message preview, message status, contact group, contact group color, chatID, and last message seen of an active chat.
        Parameters:
        username - The chat's username.
        displayName - The chat's display name.
        messagePreview - The chat's last message preview.
        messageStatus - The chat's last message status.
        contactGroup - The chat's user contact group.
        contactColor - The chat's user contact group Color.
        chatID - The chat's ID.
        lastMessageSeen - The boolean representing whether the last message was seen/read.
